text: David Rotem (; 11 January 1949 - 8 June 2015) was an Israeli politician. He served as a member of the Knesset for Yisrael Beiteinu between 2007 and 2015. He was born in Bnei Brak to a Orthodox Jewish family, and grew up in Jerusalem. Rotem died from cardiac arrest on 8 June 2015 in Efrat, West Bank, aged 66. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Yisrael Beiteinu politicians
title: David Rotem
